column4: most of the mind-numbing simple problems have the most complicated solutions
true enough.
what be your troubles?
oh, i see, did you unmute your soundcard?
I'm pretty sure I have - I did it in Apps -> Sound & video -> Volume Mixer
err, Volume Control
did you unmute all the channels? ;)
yes
I also have a tv tuner card, I dunno if that's messing with things *shrug*
hm, try opening a console and trying killall esd.
ohhhh..
that could very well be it.
forget the killall command
pop open the volume control, go to file > change device and see what the selected device is.
however, 'alsamixer' makes things more confusing, by saying that the selected devies is "Card: SiS SI7012, Chip: Realtek ALC655 trv0"
hm, changing the device to the other one and unmuting/raising the volume of that.
are you raising only the master?
I've raised all sliders to around 80%, and unmuted, on both devices
all sliders on Playback, not Capture, btw
my box is already open atm. should I try taking out the tuner card, seeing if ubuntu works nice and neatly without it?
I'm gonna try that. I'll be back in 5 mins
